R

registerRule(Object) - Method in interface org.easyrules.api.RulesEngine
Register a rule in the rules engine registry.
removeRule(Rule) - Method in class org.easyrules.core.CompositeRule
Remove a rule from the composite rule.
Rule - Annotation Type in org.easyrules.annotation
Annotation to mark a class as a rule.
Rule - Interface in org.easyrules.api
Abstraction for a rule that can be fired by the rules engine.
RuleListener - Interface in org.easyrules.api
A listener for rules execution events.
rules - Variable in class org.easyrules.core.CompositeRule
The set of composing rules.
RulesEngine - Interface in org.easyrules.api
Rules engine interface.
RulesEngineBuilder - Class in org.easyrules.core
Builder for rules engine instances.
